TEST: TOO LONG FIELD LABEL
These stata labels are longer then 80 characters which means that Stata will cut them off. The
point of having a Stata label variable is to manually make sure that the labels documenting the
variables in the data set makes sense to a human reader. The following labels should be shortened:

column6: name(s) of unspecified cryptocurrency exchange(s) and/or wallet(s) used in the past 3 months
satisfaction with cryptocurrency exchange(s) and/or wallet(s) used in past 3 months
name(s) of unspecified neobank and/or digital banking product(s) used in the past 3 months
satisfaction with neobank and/or digital banking product(s) used in past 3 months
